name: BrazilianikMakia
description:
Brazilianik Makia, Latin democracy haunted by condors, is an action-adventure game on 2d platforms with elements of metroidvania.

The false news disseminated in electoral periods distorted reality, paving the way for spirits of hate to proliferate causing a cataclysm that shook the boundaries of time and space.

Characters who stood in opposition to the hatred regime before the cataclysm spanned time and space to fight the current hatred regime.
